children.text: or click on a text to add it
«It is at night that faith in light is admirable. To trust in your fleeting dreams.  When you no longer have the courage or the desire.»

Empire of the night
The moon watches over your footsteps
The city falls asleep
«Good night, good night! Parting is such sweet sorrow, that I shall say good night till it be morrow.»
